page.title: 07 Families in West Stafford.
page.content: I wanted to know how the families of the children at our school lived.So I asked all the First Years some questions.I found out that 12.3% had three people in their household, 47.6% had four people,27.6% had five people,6% had more than six people in their house. I found out that 23% of the families had children under five years of age,and that only 1.5% had Grandparents living with them.Non had non-relatives living at home. My name is Michael Dale. My family has four people.My parents work but my brother,aged 21,is unemployed, but he has been on a bricklaying course.
